decision_conditions: The proposed amendments would lead to alterations to the approved originally approved building fenestrations by way of new materials, windows and door details and boundary treatments. However the overall building and general detailed design would remain within the spirit of the original permission. In addition, the amendments would cause no harm to the highways infrastructure, streetscape or general neighbour amenity.

In light of the above, the proposed amendments represent relatively minor alterations to the overall scheme and would not significantly impact the development at large. As such, the proposed amendment would not materially alter the previous approved scheme or contradict the policy framework. Therefore the proposed alterations to the original planning permission are considered non-material in nature and can be approved in accordance with section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended.
The following amendments are deemed to be accepted:
- Fenestration
For the purposes of clarity, the original drawing list under application P0047.14 is amended as follows:
A1898-SK200 Rev P3 - New Proposed Pedestrian Crossing
AA4106/2.1/001 - Site Location Plan
AA4106/2.1/002 Rev A - New build in relation to existing context
AA4106/2.1/003 - Demolition Plan Phase 3
AA4106/2.1/004 Rev A - New build: General Layout
AA4106/2.1/005 - Existing Levels
AA4106/2.1/006 Rev A - Proposed Levels
AA4106/2.1/010 Rev A - Block Plan Ground floor
AA4106/2.1/011 - Block Plan First floor
AA4106/2.1/012 - Block Plan Second floor
AA4106/2.1/013 - Block Plan Third floor
AA4106/2.1/014 - Block Plan Fourth floor
AA4106/2.1/016 Rev A - Block Plan Roof
AA4106/2.1/020 Rev A: Site Plan
OV4-DMA-ZA-XX-DR-A-05201(Rev P2) - NMA - Block A Front Elevation 1-1 South East
OV4-DMA-ZA-XX-DR-A-05202(Rev P2) - NMA - Block A Front Elevation 2-2 West
OV4-DMA-ZA-XX-DR-A-05203(Rev P2) - NMA - Block A Front Elevation 3-3 North
OV4-DMA-ZA-XX-DR-A-05204(Rev P2) - NMA - Block A Rear Elevation 4-4
This NMA permission grants no other changes aside of those detailed within this Decision Notice.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: In accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2019, improvements required to make the proposal acceptable were negotiated with the applicant and further details and plan revisions were provided via e-mail.
description: Non-material amendment to application P0047.14 dated 19/3/2014 to include amended building fenestrations.
